resources.string: This fragment gives the user the song he is currently listening to. He can pause, play and forward or select tracks here
User lands here and he can select the option he wishes from here
This gives the user saved songs in the saved playlist the user have saved in the folders
Here user can change his personnel preferences like profile photo, passwords, and also he can see how many followers and how many prfollowers and how many profile users he is following
Here User can buy songs. Payments will be done through Android Pay API. If we want to use any external payments like Paypay, we will be using Android Mobile Payment Library
